```scss
// Property: overrideUserInterfaceStyle
// Description: Forces the app to used assigned theme instead of the system theme.
// Component(s): Ti.UI.Picker, Ti.UI
'.override-user-interface-style-unspecified': { overrideUserInterfaceStyle: Ti.UI.USER_INTERFACE_STYLE_UNSPECIFIED }
'.override-user-interface-style-light': { overrideUserInterfaceStyle: Ti.UI.USER_INTERFACE_STYLE_LIGHT }
'.override-user-interface-style-dark': { overrideUserInterfaceStyle: Ti.UI.USER_INTERFACE_STYLE_DARK }
```
